content:
Analyze this writing and rewrite the above in similar format to it:

Meet Zabit Magomedsharipov, also known as "ZaBeast" in the UFC world. This Russian mixed martial artist has made a name for himself with his dynamic and flashy fighting style, incorporating elements of traditional martial arts and acrobatics. With a professional record of 22 wins and only one loss, Magomedsharipov has proven to be a formidable force in the featherweight division.

Magomedsharipov began his martial arts journey at a young age, starting with freestyle wrestling and sanda. He later joined the Wushu boarding school Pyat Storon Sveta, where he lived and trained for many years. At the school, he trained in a variety of disciplines, including judo, sambo, wrestling, and Brazilian jiu-jitsu, under the guidance of Gusein Magomaev.

Throughout his time at the boarding school, Magomedsharipov dedicated himself to becoming a well-rounded martial artist, and he achieved numerous notable achievements in various disciplines. In 2012, he made his professional mixed martial arts debut and began to make a name for himself in regional Russian promotions.
